frame_naming.description: Frames are automatically named using the source video filename and timestamp (e.g., 'IMG_1235_12.45s.jpg'). This makes it easy to identify which video each frame came from and supports searching/filtering by video name.
frame_naming.note: The 'frame_prefix' setting above is deprecated but kept for backward compatibility. New extractions use video name instead.

timestamp_preservation.description: Extracted frames automatically inherit the modification time (st_mtime) from their source video file. This ensures frames sort chronologically with other photos taken at the same time.
timestamp_preservation.rationale: When video files have accurate modification times (e.g., from iPhone backups), preserving these times on frames ensures they appear in correct chronological order when processed alongside regular photos.
